summary: A young honeymooning couple stop for the night at an ancient castle. Unbeknownst to them, the castle is home to a horde of vampires, who have their own plans for the couple.
cast: Sandra Julien|Jean-Marie Durand|Jacques Robiolles|Michel Delahaye|Marie-Pierre Castel|Kuelan Herce|Nicole Nancel|Dominique|Jean-Jacques Renon
title: Los temores de los vampiros
